sentence.Network_en: Whenever I have a cold I get a nosebleed.
sentence.Network_cn: 每次我感冒都会流鼻血。

sentence.Network_en: Their colleagues insulted them whenever the opportunity presented itself.
sentence.Network_cn: 一有机会，同事们就会侮辱他们。

sentence.Network_en: Whenever she refused, he'd beat her black and blue.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要她拒绝他，他就会把她打得青一块紫一块。

lj.lj_ly: if you lay eyes on him, either tonight or tomorrow or whenever, call me straight away.
lj.lj_ls: 今晚，明天或者其他任何时候，如果你看到他，立刻给我打电话。

entry.def: You use whenever to refer to any time or every time that something happens or is true.

example.ex: She always called at the vicarage whenever she was in the area...
example.tran: 只要她在那一带，她总会去拜访教区牧师。

example.ex: You can have my cottage whenever you like...
example.tran: 只要你愿意，随时都可以去我的乡间小屋住。

entry.def: You use whenever to refer to a time that you do not know or are not sure about.

example.ex: He married Miss Vancouver in 1963, or whenever it was.
example.tran: 他好像在1963年还是什么时候娶了当时的温哥华小姐。

auth_sentence.content: Whenever possible, I go to a performance here.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whenever possible, I go to a performance here.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whenever possible, I go to a performance here.

auth_sentence.content: Whenever it happened, find out and say it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whenever it happened, find out and say it.

auth_sentence.content: Whenever anyone comes, we get the children vaccinated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whenever anyone comes, we get the children vaccinated.

Sentence.sentence: Some of this you do whenever you stretch.
The general principle is simple: whenever the body has been in one position for a while, it is good to briefly stretch it in an opposite position
She would also like to have her own income, so she does not have to ask her husband for money whenever she wants to buy something.
Now, whenever anybody mentions the subject to her, she just goes silent.
Well, first of all, he kept the two dolphins together in the same tank and taught them to press levers whenever they saw a light.
Whenever they responded correctly, they were rewarded with fish

means.word_mean: 在任何…的时候；无论何时；在任何…的情况下

sentences.en: You may leave whenever you please.
sentences.cn: 你愿意什么时候离开就什么时候离开。

sentences.en: Whenever we meet him we speak to him.
sentences.cn: 每次我们见到他, 我们都和他讲话。

means.word_mean: (究竟)在什么时候, 什么场合

sentences.cn: 那你到底是什么时候买的?
